mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTYPE, FLAG, PAYDATE, MOBILE, GROUPID, SMSFLAG, STATE, UPLOADTIME, RECORDNUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, PROCESSTIME, CORPID, SOURCETYPE, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, FILETYPE, SHOPITEMID, FILEURL, SUCCESSURL, ERRORURL, DESCR from db_uploadfile where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTYPE, FLAG, PAYDATE, MOBILE, GROUPID, SMSFLAG, STATE, UPLOADTIME, RECORDNUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, PROCESSTIME, CORPID, SOURCETYPE, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, FILETYPE, SHOPITEMID, FILEURL, SUCCESSURL, ERRORURL, DESCR from db_uploadfile
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , OPER , OPERTYPE , FLAG , PAYDATE , MOBILE , GROUPID , SMSFLAG , STATE , UPLOADTIME , RECORDNUM , SUCCESSNUM , ERRORNUM , PROCESSTIME , CORPID , SOURCETYPE , OPERTIME , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , SHOPID , SHOPNAME , FILETYPE , SHOPITEMID , FILEURL , SUCCESSURL , ERRORURL , DESCR

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PAYDATE = #{paydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SMSFLAG = #{smsflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
UPLOADTIME = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RECORDNUM = #{recordnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SUCCESSNUM = #{successnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ERRORNUM = #{errornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PROCESSTIME = #{processtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SOURCETYPE = #{sourcetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FILETYPE = #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPITEMID = #{shopitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SUCCESSURL = #{successurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ERRORURL = #{errorurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
PAYDATE = #{paydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SMSFLAG = #{smsflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
UPLOADTIME = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
RECORDNUM = #{recordnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SUCCESSNUM = #{successnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
ERRORNUM = #{errornum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
PROCESSTIME = #{processtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SOURCETYPE = #{sourcetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
FILETYPE = #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPITEMID = #{shopitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SUCCESSURL = #{successurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
ERRORURL = #{errorurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
, 1=1
